item.title: Kamala Harris’s Mentor Pours Cold Water on Her Gubernatorial Plans
item.description: Willie Brown doesn’t think that the former vice president should seek to make a comeback in California.

item.title: The Worst Decision Yet on Funding Planned Parenthood
item.description: The latest decision in the Planned Parenthood case is a sloppy stew of logical fallacies.

item.title: The Fantastically Daft Meltdown over Sydney Sweeney’s Jeans
item.description: It takes a special kind of hysteric to observe a time-tested marketing formula in action and think: eugenics.

item.title: Everyone’s Just Going Crazy
item.description: American mass culture has rapidly been replaced by giant buzzing colonies of internet influencers.

item.title: Israel’s Side of the Story
item.description: There is real hardship in Gaza, but the situation on the ground is more complicated than Israel’s critics make it out to be.
